title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 531.3 - Amount of late payment charge
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 531.3 - Amount of late payment charge

State Regulations

If a one-time late payment charge may be imposed, it shall
not exceed 10 percent on the first $10 (except that a minimum charge may be
made of not to exceed 15 cents per bill), plus not to exceed three percent on
that portion of the bill over $10. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
531.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
